item.name: Space as global modifier
item.appendix: This version keeps the space key behavior while fast typing.
* Change the space key to the left shift key.
* Send a space key event when the space key is pressed alone.
* Send a space key event when the space key is released before another key is released.
For example:
Space down -> T down -> T up => Shift+T
Space down -> T down -> Space up => Space,T
Based on the sample SandS 2 script. See:
https://github.com/tekezo/Karabiner/blob/master/src/core/server/Resources/include/checkbox/standards/space.xml
item.autogen:
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::SPACE,
KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SANDS2,
KeyCode::SPACE,

item.name: Macbook Pro Built-In Keyboard: Modifiers Keys for Development
item.appendix: Add “Global Modifier” for Linux and OS X
In Linux (i.e. inside Parallels):
- maps CapsLock to Control
- maps CapsLock+Shift to Ctrl+Shift (the Linux "global" shortcut prefix)
In OS X (i.e. outside Parallels):
- maps CapsLock to Command
- maps CapsLock+Shift to Command+Ctrl+Option (the OS X "global" shortcut prefix)
Everywhere:
- maps a tap of CapsLock to Escape (for Vim)
Requires that CapsLock has been re-mapped to F19 using Seil.

item.name: Kinesis Advantage: Modifiers Keys for Development
item.appendix: Add “Global Modifier” for Linux and OS X
Maps PageDown to Command+Ctrl+Shift (the Linux "global" shortcut prefix)
Maps PageUp to Command+Option+Shift (the OS X "global" shortcut prefix)
Adds "Code Modifier" to type code characters more easily
Maps End to "Code Modifier"
"Code Modifier" + home row = ( ) + = { } [ ]
